ComicInfo.Title: Launch Day Part 1 of 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
PICK UP WHERE SEASON 2 LEFT OFF!
When seemingly hostile Krill ships cross into Union space, the Orville intercepts. Captain Mercer learns they are en route to a planet that left the Union decades ago under mysterious circumstances. Scans have discovered a moon-sized construct above the planet, and the Krill intend a preemptive strike against the presumed weapon. But is it?
Written by The Orville Executive Producer David A. Goodman!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 19:34:16. [CVDB797200]
ComicInfo.Letterer: Richard Starkings, Comicraft's Jimmy Betancourt, Jimmy Betancourt
ComicInfo.Characters: Admiral Ozawa, Bortus, Claire Finn, Ed Mercer, Gordon Malloy, Isaac, John LaMarr, Kelly Grayson, Klyden, Kratok, Pret, Talla Keyali , Topa, Ycil
ComicInfo.Teams: Alibar, Krill, Moclan, USS Orville Crew
